dinos.addTamedDino: INSERT INTO TamedDinos (id, name, level, health, stamina, oxygen, food, weight, melee, speed, torpor, species, gender, notes, imprint, father, mother, addedBy, tribe, status) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
dinos.addOrUpdateTamedDino: INSERT INTO TamedDinos (id, name, level, health, stamina, oxygen, food, weight, melee, speed, torpor, species, gender, notes, imprint, father, mother, addedBy, tribe, status, datemodified) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = ?, level = ?, health = ?, stamina = ?, oxygen = ?, food = ?, weight = ?, melee = ?, speed = ?, torpor = ?, species = ?, gender = ?, notes = ?, imprint = ?, father = ?, mother = ?, updatedby = ?, tribe = ?, status =?, datemodified = ?
dinos.getAllTamedDinos: SELECT TamedDinos.*, Users.username FROM TamedDinos LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=TamedDinos.addedby
dinos.getDinoById: SELECT TamedDinos.*, Users.username FROM TamedDinos LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=TamedDinos.addedby WHERE TamedDinos.id = ?
dinos.updateTamedDino: UPDATE TamedDinos SET name = ?, level = ?, health = ?, stamina = ?, oxygen = ?, food = ?, weight = ?, melee =?, speed = ?, torpor = ?, species = ?, gender = ?, notes = ?, imprint = ?, father = ?, mother = ?, addedBy = ?, tribe = ? WHERE id = ?
dinos.insertUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Users(userId, username, accessToken, refreshToken) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
dinos.updateUser: UPDATE Users SET  username = ?, accessToken = ? WHERE userId = ?
dinos.updateUserWithRefresh: UPDATE Users SET username = ?, accessToken = ?, refreshToken = ?, WHERE userId = ?
dinos.deleteUserTokens: UPDATE Users SET refreshToken = NULL, accessToken = NULL WHERE userId = ?
dinos.getUserTokens: SELECT accessToken, refreshToken FROM Users WHERE userId = ?
dinos.getUsersJoinTamedDinos: SELECT Users.username, Users.userId FROM Users INNER JOIN TamedDinos On TamedDinos.addedby=Users.userId
dinos.addTamedDino: INSERT INTO TamedDinos (id, name, level, health, stamina, oxygen, food, weight, melee, speed, torpor, species, gender, notes, imprint, father, mother, addedBy, tribe) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
dinos.getAllTamedDinos: SELECT TamedDinos.*, Users.username FROM TamedDinos LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=TamedDinos.addedby
dinos.updateTamedDino: UPDATE TamedDinos SET name = ?, level = ?, health = ?, stamina = ?, oxygen = ?, food = ?, weight = ?, melee =?, speed = ?, torpor = ?, species = ?, gender = ?, notes = ?, imprint = ?, father = ?, mother = ?, addedBy = ?, tribe = ? WHERE id = ?

generators.getAllGenerators: SELECT Generators.*, Users.username FROM Generators LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=Generators.filledBy
generators.addOrUpdateGenerator: INSERT INTO Generators (id, name, server, count, filledBy, fillDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = ?, server = ?, count = ?
generators.fillGenerator: UPDATE Generators SET filledBy = ?, fillDate = ? WHERE id = ?
generators.getGeneratorById: SELECT Generators.*, Users.username FROM Generators LEFT JOIN Users On Users.userId=Generators.filledBy WHERE Generators.id = ?

auth.insertUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Users(userId, username, accessToken, refreshToken) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?)
auth.updateUser: UPDATE Users SET  username = ?, accessToken = ? WHERE userId = ?
auth.insertOrUpdateUser: INSERT INTO Users (userId, username, accessToken, refreshToken) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username= ?, accessToken = ?, refreshToken = ?
auth.updateUserWithRefresh: UPDATE Users SET username = ?, accessToken = ?, refreshToken = ?, WHERE userId = ?
auth.deleteUserTokens: UPDATE Users SET refreshToken = NULL, accessToken = NULL WHERE userId = ?
auth.getUserTokens: SELECT accessToken, refreshToken FROM Users WHERE userId = ?
auth.insertGuilds: INSERT IGNORE INTO Guilds (guildId, guildName) VALUES ?
auth.getUserTokens: SELECT accessToken, refreshToken FROM Users WHERE userId = ?
auth.adminGetUsersGuilds: SELECT Guilds.guildName, Users.username FROM UserGuilds INNER JOIN Guilds ON UserGuilds.guildId = Guilds.guildId INNER JOIN Users ON UserGuilds.userId = Users.userId
